name: 3rd Emirates Dermatology Society Conference
content: The Emirates Dermatology Society Conference (EDSC 2019) will be held in Dubai, United Arab Emirates on November 22-24, 2019\. The Emirates Dermatology Society Conference (EDSC 2019) is dedicated to cutting-edge scientific programs for practitioners in dermatology. EDSC covers topics such as: • Fillers • Psoriasis • Rosacea • Pediatric Dermatology • Surgical Skills • Acne • Laser • Botox • Dermatoscopy • Threads
